div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1791 Persia, before 1895 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 10+ AR Persia: 10+ sigloi (5 "king with spear," 5 "king with dagger") Disposition: London 10 BMC Arabia nos. 6, 7, 16, 49, 52, 112, 124, 126, 130, 133 Schlumberger, L'argent glee, p. 6
